title: WildFly 34.0.1 is released!
content: WildFly 34.0.1.Final is now available .  It’s been about a month since the WildFly 34 release, so we have done a small bug fix update, WildFly 34.0.1. This includes an update to WildFly Preview.  The following issues were resolved in 34.0.1:   BUGS   * [] - ISPN000299: Unable to acquire lock… when cancelling a persistent timer    in @PostConstruct on a suspended node   * [] - Wrong routing of EJB calls in cluster   COMPONENT UPGRADES   * [] - Upgrade RESTEasy to 6.2.11.Final   * [] - Upgrade RESTEasy to 7.0.0.Alpha4 (WF preview)   * [] - Upgrade Netty to 4.1.115.Final   * [] - Upgrade wildfly-clustering to 1.1.3.Final  Enjoy!
